actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Education Department, OMB, GAO.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts, and Humanities

official_title: A bill to provide for the Mary McLeod Bethune Memorial Fine Arts Center to be established by the Bethune-Cookman College in Volusia County, Florida.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Education to provide financial assistance to the Bethune-Cookman College in Volusia County, Florida, to establish the Mary McLeod Bethune Memorial Fine Arts Center. Authorizes appropriations for such purpose.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the Mary McLeod Bethune Memorial Fine Arts Center to be established by the Bethune-Cookman College in Volusia County, Florida.
